#include "stdio.h"
#include "stdlib.h"
#define ll long long unsigned int
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
ll r()
{
	ll x=0;
	char c=gc();
	while(c<48||c>57)
	c=gc();
	while(c>=48&&c<=57)
	{
		x=x*10+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}	
return x;
}
void m(ll q)
{
	ll rev=0,i,x,ct=0,n=q;
	if(n==0)
	{
	    pc('0');
	    pc('\n');
	    return;
	}
	while(n%10==0)
	{
		++ct;
		n/=10;
	}	
	while(q)
	{
		rev=rev*10+q%10;
		q/=10;
	}	
	while(rev)
	{
		pc(rev%10+48);
		rev/=10;
	}
	while(ct--)
	pc('0');
	pc('\n');
}	
int compare(const void *a,const void *b)
{
 	return( *(ll*)a - *(ll*)b);
}
ll A[10000005];
int main()
{
	ll t,k,n,i,s;
	t=r();
	while(t--)
	{
		pc('\n');
		s=0;
		n=r();
		k=r();
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			A[i]=r();
		}
		qsort(A,n,sizeof(ll),compare);
		for(i=n-1;i>=n-k;i--)
		{
			s+=A[i];
		}
	m(s);
	}
return 0;
}
